d:I[22016,["/_next/static/chunks/3254475d9f795eed.js"],""]
e:T70f,<br/># Perplexity's 'Computer' vs OpenClaw: What's the Difference?<br/><br/>This morning, Perplexity AI launched **Computer**—their take on autonomous AI agents. CEO Aravind Srinivas described it as "OpenClaw for everyone else." But how do they actually compare?<br/><br/>## OpenClaw: The Self-Hosted Pioneer<br/><br/>OpenClaw is **open-source and self-hosted**. You run it on your own hardware, which means:<br/><br/>- ✅ Full control over your data<br/>- ✅ Customizable with community skills<br/>- ✅ No monthly fees (just API costs)<br/>- ❌ Requires technical setup<br/>- ❌ You manage updates and maintenance<br/><br/>## Perplexity Computer: The Managed Alternative<br/><br/>Perplexity Computer is a **cloud-hosted service** available to Pro/Max subscribers:<br/><br/>- ✅ No setup required—just log in<br/>- ✅ Integrated with Perplexity's search engine<br/>- ✅ Automatic updates and maintenance<br/>- ❌ Monthly subscription fee<br/>- ❌ Less control over data/privacy<br/><br/>## Which One Should You Choose?<br/><br/>**Choose OpenClaw if:**<br/>- You value privacy and want full control<br/>- You're comfortable with technical setup<br/>- You want to build custom skills<br/>- You prefer open-source software<br/><br/>**Choose Perplexity Computer if:**<br/>- You want something that "just works"<br/>- You're already a Perplexity subscriber<br/>- You prioritize convenience over customization<br/>- You don't want to manage infrastructure<br/><br/>## The Bigger Picture<br/><br/>The fact that Perplexity is entering this space validates what OpenClaw started. AI agents aren't a niche experiment—they're the next platform shift.<br/><br/>Expect more competition in the coming months. Google, Microsoft, and others are surely working on their own versions. The race is on.<br/>    4:[["$","header",null,{"className":"border-b border-slate-200 bg-white","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4 py-6","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center justify-between","children":[["$","$Ld",null,{"href":"/","className":"flex items-center space-x-2","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-slate-900","children":["OpenClaw ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-blue-600","children":"News"}]]}]}],["$","nav",null,{"className":"hidden md:flex items-center space-x-8 text-sm","children":[["$","$Ld",null,{"href":"/","className":"text-slate-700 hover:text-slate-900","children":"Home"}],["$","$Ld",null,{"href":"/about","className":"text-slate-700 hover:text-slate-900","children":"About"}],["$","$Ld",null,{"href":"/tutorials","className":"text-slate-700 hover:text-slate-900","children":"Tutorials"}]]}]]}]}]}],["$","article",null,{"className":"max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-12","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"mb-12","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center gap-3 mb-4","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 text-sm font-medium rounded-full","children":"News"}],["$","time",null,{"className":"text-slate-600 text-sm","children":"February 26, 2026"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-slate-600 text-sm","children":"·"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-slate-600 text-sm","children":"4 min read"}]]}],["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-slate-900 mb-6","children":"Perplexity's 'Computer' vs OpenClaw: What's the Difference?"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-xl text-slate-600","children":"Perplexity just launched Computer, their answer to OpenClaw. Here's how they stack up and what it means for AI agents."}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose prose-lg max-w-none","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$e"}}],["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-16","children":"$Lf"}]]}]]
